title: @Riot, when can I play Amumu jungle again?
body: It is pretty obvious by all the [nonexistent] Amumu's out there that the nerf to his W was undeserved. How about you bring that power back so that we can have our sad mummy again?

replies.body: {{champion:33}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:154}} Waiting in line behind you man.
I don't remember what the nerf was, but if it was a damage to champions related nerf then they could have have it deal extra damage to minions/monsters.
They increased champions', minions' and monsters' HP and thought that nerfing Amumu's HP/second damage on W was the right way to do it. Clearly, they were wrong.
